ShutterStock._note: FTPS connection - encrypted. Use your regular Shutterstock account credentials.

Pond5._note: FTP connection - requires separate FTP password generated in account settings.

123RF._note: FTP connection - content_type can be 'photos', 'video', or 'audio' for different servers.

DepositPhotos._note: FTP connection - use your email as username.

Alamy._note: FTP connection - files go to different folders based on type (Stock/News/Archive/Vectors).

Dreamstime._note: FTP connection - can use username or numeric user ID.

AdobeStock._note: SFTP connection - encrypted. Requires qualified account. Generate SFTP credentials in contributor portal.

_instructions.setup: 1. Copy this file to credentials.json, 2. Fill in your actual credentials, 3. Remove _note and _instructions fields
_instructions.security: Keep this file secure - it contains passwords in plain text
_instructions.testing: Use --test-connections to verify your credentials work
